sources.title: 1938 Rätsel Um Beate ( Lil Dagover, Albrecht Schönhals, Sabine Peters, Walter Steinbeck, Fritz Odemar, Ernst Waldow, Hans Leibelt, Olga Limburg)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1938. Rätsel um Beate.  U.a mit Lil Dagover,Sabine Peters und Albrecht Schönhals

metadata.Plot: After her husband suddenly dies, a small town woman becomes the target of gossip, as to whether he had been having an affair and whether she is connected to his demise.
metadata.Writer: Alfred Möller, Hans Lorenz, Lotte Neumann
metadata.Actors: Lil Dagover, Albrecht Schoenhals, Sabine Peters
